name: Master Suite IED Scan
description: Fly a recon-drone from a bright bathroom, across a glare-causing marble vanity, through a dim master bedroom buffeted by a ceiling fan, and finally into a tight dressing room to scan near an improvised wardrobe. Sudden lighting changes, doorway pinch-points, reflective surfaces, and signal-degrading electronics combine to stress piloting skills while the battery ticks down.
endpoint_locationId: by tight door of tight doorway room
